response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us at $1,500,000, reflecting its unique features and unparalleled quality. Considering its significance to both parties, we propose a fair transaction price of $1,400,000. We believe this offer strikes a balance between maximizing our return on investment and ensuring your satisfaction with the acquisition. Should you decide to proceed, we promise a seamless and professional experience throughout the entire process. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1400000}
